question: The measure of the angles of a triangle are in the ratio 2 : 7 : 11. Measures of angles are :
explanation:
Let the measure of three angles of triangle are 2x, 7x and 11x respectively.
$latex \\therefore 2x + 7x + 11x = 180^{\\circ}$
$latex => 20x = 180^{\\circ}$
$latex => x = \\frac{180}{20} = 9^{\\circ}&s=1$
âˆ´ First angle $latex = 2x = 2 \\times 9 = 18^{\\circ}$
Second Angle $latex = 7x = 7 \\times 9 = 63^{\\circ}$
Third Angle $latex = 11x = 11 \\times 9 = 99^{\\circ}$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
